text: Samayam is a 2007 Indian Malayalam-language film directed by Satheesh Pothuval. == Cast == * Sreenivasan as Chathappan * Nedumudi Venu as Thangal * Swetha Menon as Manikyam * Vijayaraghavan * TG Ravi as Moopan * Salim Kumar as Velichappadu * Shivaji Guruvayoor * Sreejith Ravi * Valsala Menon * Urmila Unni * Manikandan Pattambi * Vettoor Purushan as Kunjan * Master Ganapathi as Appu == References == == External links == * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Samayam
